long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome Extension for supercharging the TestRail workflow. 

Features:
1. Allow users to navigate to similar test case in the other suite with ease.
2. Allow user to copy links in full screen view of a test case.

For more information, check out: https://github.com/kaldor/TestRail-Plus
